plays.text: Penalty to Greg de Vries 2 minutes for High Sticking Dallas Drake
Goal scored by Keith Tkachuk assisted by Doug Weight and Pavol Demitra
Penalty to Eric Boguniecki 2 minutes for Roughing Alex Tanguay
Penalty to Keith Tkachuk 2 minutes for Crosschecking Radim Vrbata
Penalty to Peter Forsberg 2 minutes for Interference Al MacInnis
Goal scored by Scott Mellanby unassisted
Goal scored by Vaclav Nedorost assisted by Martin Skoula and Brian Willsie
Penalty to Scott Mellanby 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Mike Keane
Penalty to Martin Skoula 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Dallas Drake
Goal scored by Joe Sakic assisted by Derek Morris and Peter Forsberg
Goal scored by Dan Hinote assisted by Alex Tanguay
Penalty to Barret Jackman 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Dan Hinote
Penalty to Dan Hinote 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Barret Jackman
Goal scored by Bryce Salvador assisted by Cory Stillman and Christian Laflamme
Goal scored by Cory Stillman assisted by Petr Cajanek
Goal scored by Mike Keane assisted by Joe Sakic and Eric Messier
Penalty to Reed Low 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Alex Tanguay
Penalty to Joe Sakic 2 minutes for Tripping Eric Boguniecki
Penalty to Adam Foote 2 minutes for Slashing Keith Tkachuk
